sentences.sContent: You cannot get a work visa without an American sponsor.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有美国担保人就拿不到工作签证。

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranOther: someone who officially agrees to help someone else, or to be responsible for what they do
to give money to a sports event, theatre, institution etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise
